pullrequest.title: Install cmake files to share instead of lib

content.raw:
The use of `DATAROOT` and `SHARE` in these variables is inconsistent. Should we stick with one or the other? For example the set of variables could be `IGN_DATAROOT_INSTALL_DIR`, `IGN_DATAROOT_INSTALL_DIR_POSTFIX`, `IGN_DATAROOT_INSTALL_DIR`.

I like `DATAROOT` more than `SHARE` because `SHARE` alludes to the `share` filesystem folder, which may not be actual place the installed files end up in the future.
